locations.name: Thar Desert
locations.description: A popular desert for dune bashing, especially near Jaisalmer, with beautiful dunes and rich history.

locations.name: Rann of Kutch
locations.description: The salt marsh desert offers a unique dune bashing experience, particularly during the Rann Utsav festival.

locations.name: Sam Sand Dunes
locations.description: Famous for its large sand dunes, Sam Sand Dunes near Jaisalmer offers an exciting dune bashing adventure.

locations.name: Ladakh Desert
locations.description: Known for its high-altitude desert terrain, Ladakh offers thrilling dune bashing with breathtaking views.

locations.name: Nubra Valley
locations.description: Located in Ladakh, Nubra Valley offers an exciting dune bashing experience amidst towering dunes and spectacular landscapes.

locations.name: Kutch Desert
locations.description: Offering scenic views, Kutch Desert is ideal for off-roading and dune bashing, especially during the winter months.

locations.name: Jaisalmer Desert
locations.description: Known for its golden sands and vast desert terrain, Jaisalmer offers thrilling dune bashing tours.

locations.name: Bikaner Desert
locations.description: Bikaner is known for its vast dunes and is a lesser-known but amazing spot for dune bashing.

locations.name: Madhya Pradesh Desert
locations.description: Madhya Pradesh offers unique desert experiences, perfect for off-roading and dune bashing during the dry season.

locations.name: Desert National Park
locations.description: Located near Jaisalmer, this national park offers not only dune bashing but also a rich diversity of wildlife.
